# CLHeadingComponentValue

**Type Alias**

A type used to report magnetic differences reported by the onboard hardware.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias CLHeadingComponentValue = Double
```

## Getting the raw heading data

- **x**: The geomagnetic data (measured in microteslas) for the x-axis.
- **y**: The geomagnetic data (measured in microteslas) for the y-axis.
- **z**: The geomagnetic data (measured in microteslas) for the z-axis.

items.description: The geomagnetic data (measured in microteslas) for the x-axis.
items.name: x

items.description: The geomagnetic data (measured in microteslas) for the y-axis.
items.name: y

items.description: The geomagnetic data (measured in microteslas) for the z-axis.
